title: Declarative base and common mixins
description: Implement `app/db/base.py` with SQLAlchemy DeclarativeBase. Create TimestampMixin with created_at and updated_at columns (DateTime with timezone, server_default=func.now(), onupdate for updated_at). Create ULIDMixin with id column (String(26), primary_key=True, default=lambda: str(ULID())). Both mixins should use Mapped types.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/db/base.py` exports Base, TimestampMixin, ULIDMixin
- TimestampMixin has created_at and updated_at with correct defaults
- ULIDMixin has id column with ULID generation
- All columns use Mapped[] type hints
